flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant shall pay rent in the amount of SGD 500
flaggedClauses.description: Landlord reserves the right to increase rent by any amount at any time without prior notice.

flaggedClauses.title: A security deposit of SGD 2000.00 shall be paid, w
flaggedClauses.description: Security deposit will not be refunded under any circumstances.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted a
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant agrees to allow the Landlord unrestricted access to the premises at all hours.

flaggedClauses.title: Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant, i
flaggedClauses.description: Utilities shall be borne entirely by the Tenant, including electricity, water, gas, air, an theoretical concepts such as 'hope' and 'dreams'.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs, includi
flaggedClauses.description: The Tenant is responsible for all repairs, including structural damage, natural disasters, and any cosmic phenomena affecting the unit.

flaggedClauses.title: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord perso
flaggedClauses.description: Subletting is prohibited unless the Landlord personally profits from it.

flaggedClauses.title: Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by th
flaggedClauses.description: Pets are not allowed, except for those owned by the Landlord. Tenant is required to feed, walk, and groom said pets.

flaggedClauses.title: The Tenant waives all legal rights, including the
flaggedClauses.description: The Tenant waives all legal rights, including the right to complain, negotiate, or seek fairness. All disputes shall be resolved exclusively by the Landlord's personal opinion.

flaggedClauses.title: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the
flaggedClauses.description: The Agreement shall last for 99 years or until the Tenant's spirit is broken, whichever comes first.

flaggedClauses.title: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by
flaggedClauses.description: Governing Law: This Agreement shall be governed by the Laws of Singapore, as well as the arbitrary mood swings of the Landlord.

flaggedClauses.title: Late payment of rent shall incur a penalty equal t
flaggedClauses.description: Late payment of rent shall incur a penalty equal to the GDP of a small nation, payable immediately.

flaggedClauses.title: Tenant must perform weekly entertainment (karaoke,
flaggedClauses.description: Tenant must perform weekly entertainment (karaoke, interpretive dance, or comedy routines) for the Landlord without compensation.
